name: influence
description: You are an idea. You are ephemeral, infectious, and rapacious. It is your mission to occupy the thoughts of every mind. Go. Spread. Convince. Influence. Play against computer controlled opponents or online against other humans in this casual real-time strategy game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual Core CP Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB nVidia 8600 series DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card Additional Notes: Turning on the faster graphics setting and/or playing with fewer neutral ids may improve performance
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Later Processor: 2.66 GHz Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB ATI 4800 Series, 512MB nVidia 8800 series DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
